name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
description: 7'2" center, all-time leading scorer (before LeBron). 6 championships, 6 MVPs. The sky hook was unguardable. Intellectual, dignified.

sky-hook.name: Sky Hook
sky-hook.description: The most unstoppable shot in basketball history
sky-hook.prompt: executing perfect sky hook - arm fully extended high above head, ball releasing from fingertips at apex, body turned sideways, impossible to block, the most beautiful unstoppable shot ever

goggles-intensity.name: Goggles Intensity
goggles-intensity.prompt: standing with signature protective goggles - intense focused stare, quiet determination, intellectual warrior, the dignified legend who let his game speak

blocking-shot.name: Rim Protector
blocking-shot.prompt: swatting away shot attempt at the rim - incredibly long arms extended, ball being redirected, the paint protector who anchored dynasties, no easy baskets

post-position.name: Low Post Position
post-position.description: Establishing deep post position, about to score
post-position.prompt: establishing dominant low post position - back to basket, feeling defender, about to unleash sky hook or counter, patient post play as an art form

running-hook.name: Running Hook
running-hook.description: Sky hook variation while moving across lane
running-hook.prompt: shooting sky hook while moving across lane - body in motion, arm still extending high, adapting signature shot to any situation, unstoppable in any context

championship-trophy.name: Trophy Raised
championship-trophy.prompt: raising championship trophy overhead - dignified expression of earned triumph, goggles on, six-time champion, the culmination of a legendary career
